channel.title: Holiday Signatures
channel.description:
Well, I figured it being the Holiday Season, why not have just a fun competition. I'm not saying like a 'Sig of the week' competition or anything obviously. But just for fun, everyone can submit a signature with a Winter/Holiday theme. I'm thinking the dimensions should be around the size of a regular signature, nothing like LPOTM or anything. Nothing larger than 250x450 should be fine. Same rules that apply to the forums apply to the competition.
I'll be entering, so I expect you all to enter. Just post your finished piece in this topic, and I guess we can have a vote or something. There's no prize, it's just for fun. And to get into the spirit of the season. If you want you could maybe even give it as a gift to someone.

item.title: Holiday Signatures
item.dc:creator: @KevinS KevinS
item.description:
@KevinS wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:12, topic:248135”][quote author=KevinS link=topic=327171.msg2564751#msg2564751 date=1228342073]

Yayyy for atheist people. I have no religion either XD

Not conforming to a religion does not make you atheist you retarded cunt/

Then tell me what makes you atheist?
[/quote]
Completely denying the possibility of a god makes you an atheist. Not conforming to a religion makes you a nontheist.[/quote]
Well I do I do not belive in god nor do I think god never existed. So the reson I said I have no religion was me trying to get at me not beliving in god.
I would like to call this a fail at you but I would sound like an ass so I would rather this just me clarifying what I said.

Read full topic
